task.title: Installing the Sametime Meeting add-in from a URL
task.shortdesc: You can install the HCL Sametime Meetings add-in to Microsoft Outlook from a URL.

step.cmd: In the Add-Ins window, click My add-ins.
In the Custom add-ins section, click Add a custom add-in.
From the drop-down menu select Add from URL.

image.alt: Graphic showing Add from URL link

step.cmd: Enter the URL for the add-in manifest file and click OK. The manifest file is located where the user hosts the application.
A warning message displays on screen. Click Install.
After the installation completes, the HCL Sametime Meetings add-in is listed under the Custom add-ins section.

image.alt: Graphic showing HCL Sametime Meeting added

taskbody.result: You can now add a Sametime meeting when scheduling a meeting in Outlook. The Sametime Meeting icon is located in the meeting scheduler task bar. Click the icon to add a meeting room to the meeting invitation.
